translated: Charles V had repeatedly war against the King of France (1521-1526, 1527-1529, 1536-1538, 1542-1544, 1552-1556) and his son Philip II continued the battle until 1559.
original: Charles Quint fit plusieurs fois la guerre au roi de France (1521–1526, 1527–1529, 1536–1538, 1542–1544, 1552–1556), et son fils Philippe II continua le combat jusqu'en 1559.
